title: What Advisors Can Learn From a Decorated US Navy SEAL Veteran
description: Building trust happens over time yet "it doesn't take a lot to destroy that trust," says David Sears who retired from the Navy after serving for 20 years.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Building trust happens over time yet "it doesn't take a lot to destroy that trust," says David Sears who retired from the Navy after serving for 20 years.
